articles.title: Oklahoma State football coach Mike Gundy asks why Texas, Oklahoma allowed in Big 12 business meetings
articles.description: Oklahoma State football coach Mike Gundy said that if he was the Big 12 commissioner, he wouldn't allow representatives from Texas and Oklahoma, who are leaving to join the SEC, to attend any of the conference's business meetings.
